We evaluate, prioritize, dispatch and follow client work requests through to completion to ensure the standards for safe, high quality and cost effective building environments are met. When you are not sure who else to call or where to turn, call us and we will be able to help.   The NYU Client Services Center is the primary point of contact for service and maintenance requests for the University's buildings. If you have or see a need for maintenance service, please contact us.          You can call the Client Services Center for a variety of problems such as:     Temperature control   Water leaks and dripping   Leaky bathroom faucet   Acquiring shelves (charges may apply)   Malfunctioning lights   Smells & unpleasant odors            How can we help you....                                 Learn about NYU building safety procedures and ongoing construction projects.                                 Find the appropriate forms and contact info to request repairs or maintenance.                                 Learn about our department's efforts to promote sustainability and ways in which you can help.                          Contact Us   NYU Client Services Center  285 Mercer Street, 6th Floor  New York, New York 10003  Tel: +1 212-998-1001  Fax: +1 212-995-4671  Email: contactcsc@nyu.edu  Website: NYU Client Services Center                                                         Work Order Form                                                                                  NYU Footer          Search      Directory      Campus Map      Events      Contact Us      Site Map      Copyright and Fair Use      Feedback         Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright New York University. Mission   Our job is to provide the safety, highest quality, best value research, teaching, and residential environments possible for faculty and students to live, learn and work   The Office of Construction Management and Strategic Services is responsible for:      Construction  management for academic and infrastructure capital projects    Post-project  and client quality assurance reviews    Due  diligence review for property acquisitions    Infrastructure  strategic planning and budgeting    Code  compliance standards, monitoring and reporting    Engineering  standards and commissioning    Project  management policies and procedures    Sustainability  and energy standards and programs    Central  plant operations and maintenance    MEP  infrastructure operations and maintenance    Academic  and administrative facilities operations and maintenance           https://www.nyu.edu/fcm/workrequestform/ Our team is organized by 8 key functional areas: the Office of Construction Management; Sustainability, Energy and Technical Services; Facilities Management; the Office of Faculty Housing; Campus Services; Human Resources; Finance & Technology; and Public Safety.   Together, this team delivers the safest, best value, highest quality learning, research and residential environments possible to enable faculty and students to do their best work unimpeded and without distraction or risk.                                    Looking for help?    If you're looking for more information about our work or need help with a building related issue, please visit our Client Services Center .
